website_summaries.verdict: This is a natural peppermint oil that has a wonderful scent and does an impressive job for an abundance of external uses.
pros: Includes a dropper, making the oil easy to dole out in small quantities
Great quality, so a little goes a long way
Is good for a wide range of external uses
Offers a natural solution to keeping pests at bay
cons: Bottles seem to be of inconsistent strength among repeat purchasers
Some say later batches seemed weaker in scent and properties

customer_reviews.title: No more varmint using mint.  Hey! Var”mint”
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for an excellent price! I noticed a smell in my garage and then saw a few mouse droppings. Gross!!! I looked up howto get rid of mice naturally using essential oils and peppermint oil came up. I bought this giant 4oz bottle to combat the varmint. Lol. I placed drops of oil on cotton balls and threw them around the garage. What do you know, no more new dead varmint smell, and my garage smells minty fresh!! I read the mice run away from mint!!!
customer_reviews.author: MstrssGrim

customer_reviews.title: This is not essential oil!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this company has high reviews but these oils are not essential. They smell awful. I've bought other brands and even the clearly cut brands don't smell as bad as Purely Majestic. I can't pinpoint what that smell is but it is not pleasant. I'm returning them ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: educator2612

customer_reviews.title: This is not 100% pure peppermint oil!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many essentials oils and this one is definitely not 100% peppermint oil. I am so disappointed as this appears to mixed with spearmint oil and other chemicals. Buyers beware and do not order!!
customer_reviews.author: GPB

customer_reviews.title: Is this safe to breathe?
customer_reviews.text: This sure does not smell like other peppermint oils I have used over the decades. The company has not responded to my questions or phone calls about whether this "pure" product actually contains peppermint. I also asked whether it is plant derived, synthetic based or otherwise adulterated. Did it come from a peppermint plant or is it just perfumed oil? Is this product safe to breathe? It did not pass my basic peppermint oil test: I let a drop dry on a piece of paper and it left an oily ring which to me signifies that it is not pure, as its name implies.
customer_reviews.author: TD Karantsalis

customer_reviews.title: Not pure essential oil. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Not pure essential oil. Did not pass the paper test. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: My Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Huge Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how large this bottle was until I received it and I was pleasantly surprised this will last bottle will last me a very long time. It has a nice strong smell when you open the bottle. I have tried it in my diffuser and it worked well. But I really like to put a few drops on the edge of the shower, it makes for a very refreshing shower. Just stick a few drops on the edge of the shower where the steam hits it but the water doesn't wash it away.
customer_reviews.author: Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Scent
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful scent! Great for those days when you're congested. The fact that it comes with a dropper is great! For those of you still counting drops from the bottle, you'll love this!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this brand. this is my second order of their peppermint. I highly recommend. it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P

customer_reviews.title: Top Grade Oils!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! Excellent Grade! Will def order here nezt time. A little goes a VERY long way in my hommade shae butter creams! Thanks Majestic!
customer_reviews.author: Codie Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Less than 4 oz in 4 oz bottle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 different 4 oz essential oils. Both came in different size bottles claiming 4 oz This peaked my interest so I opened the bottle(s), measured liquid content to learn it was shy of 4 oz. No residual oil left in bottle to compensate for the less than 4 oz measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Marvelcnn

customer_reviews.title: Not pure, got my family sick, please save your money for some good brand oil.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil after I read many review and I thought it would be great. I got it today and I need to say I am not very impress with it...the bottles I got smell like it is not pure and also smell like one of the fake chocolate peppermint smell ( I compare it to NOW brand peppermint smell) and both my husband and baby (6 months) HATE the smell and start to have issue with it within one hours of using it. Will be return items :(
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff - having a real "aphid/chiggar" problem this ...
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff - having a real "aphid/chiggar" problem this year and they hate menthol - don't use too much - or you will freeze in you hot bath LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could leave ZERO STARS.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I've ordered this in the past and it was amazing and perfect. I was almost out and ordered another bottle and this bottle doesn't smell like the last one. It smells like spearmint and very chemically. HORRIBLE!!! Do not buy!!!! I certainly won't be buying again. :/
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I use this to deter mice in stored cars.
customer_reviews.text: Take a condiment cup, place a cotton ball inside, drop a couple of drops of Peppermint Oil on the cotton ball. Poke a few holes in the condiment cup cover and place about 4-5 inside a stored car for the winter. You will never see a rodent inside the car. When you take the car out in the spring, it smells so fresh and clean. Works every time, even on my lawn tractor.We store about 60 cars and we use this for all the cars! Tremendous product! Lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Paciorek

customer_reviews.title: Caution when opening--Do Not try to use Orifice Reducer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Caution when opening!! The orifice reducer is not sealed onto the rim. I opened the shipping package and went to "shake" a couple drops in my hand to test and the plastic orifice reducer came right out in my hand! I also spilt ~1-2 ounces all over my hand and floor. Definitely potent! I washed my hands several times without full relief from the intensity for several hours. Mopped up my floor...still smells lovely today though on a tolerable level now. Disappointed in the packaging and loss of product. Happy with the quality of the oil.
customer_reviews.author: BellazMix

customer_reviews.title: 3 drops to my diffuser. Smells amazingly fresh! ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 drops to my diffuser. Smells amazingly fresh! The bottle is bigger than I thought. Will definitely try lavender next time. The peppermint mist keeps me awake at work naturally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use 4 critters. Great smell no kill.ad on tv now a mint bug spray make ur own.
customer_reviews.text: Used for mice ...WORKS...keep them away also heard it works on other bugs...put in water bottle with water make strong if u want oil to stay longer no oily residue left on anything to damage ...best pest control ever ...now there advertising on tv a spray with mint in it....this smells very clean got comments on the clean smell of home...also will pant mint outside home this spring around places like door put in containers mint will take over gardens ...put in bucket cut bottom out won't take over go thur out gardens .....smells great
customer_reviews.author: Grandmommy

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: This peppermint oil did not have much of a scent at all! The scent that it has, does not last long at all either. I ordered it to use in products that I make such as candles, soaps, etc. I also wanted to use it in my diffuser. I have used Majestic Pure oils before and was happy with them, but this one has hardly any scent. I've wasted my money and will not be ordering from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: deb624

customer_reviews.title: Buyer BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product for YEARS, but this time it is NOT peppermint oil. Whatever got inside this bottle smells like Raid.
customer_reviews.author: Ashly Love

customer_reviews.title: Power stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of bad reviews about this product but sorry I cannot relate to them. I don't know about the chemical makeup but this is some powerful stuff! It only takes a single drop for many uses, so be careful when using it full strength! My wife had some serious pain one night because of a root canal. I took a q-tip and dipped it in this oil and had her rub it on her gum where the pain was. No lie - THE PAIN STOPPED AFTER ABOUT 10 SECONDS!!! Peppermint oil is good for a lot of stuff, and this is a good product to have at the house in my opinion. Works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: edavis

customer_reviews.title: would recommend definitely for spider issues inside the home
customer_reviews.text: immediately after placing drops of this around my home i havent had problems with spiders where i was seeing them everyday prior. would recommend definitely for spider issues inside the home.
customer_reviews.author: Joycelynne Coleman

customer_reviews.title: ABOVE 3% OF THE "ONE-STAR RATING REVIEW ON ANYTHING ...I WILL NEVER NEVER BUY..
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS NOT PEPPERMINT BUT MIXTURE OF COCONUT AND MINT OILS ,NUT A PURE PEPPERMINT OIL !! I DON'T KNOW WHO TO BLAME IN THIS MISSTAKE , MAYBE IF I BUY IT AGIN AND IT STILL SMELLS AWFUL THAN I KNOW IT'S THE MANUFACTURER
customer_reviews.author: TONY

customer_reviews.title: Great Quaility - Multiple Uses
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this item twice now and love it. During monsoon season, ants can become an issue, peppermint oil helps keep them away, just a few drops on a dish towel does the trick. Also during the summer we use cooling ties to keep make the heat bearable; a few drops of water keeps the cooling ties fresh. Many more uses, great product
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Tree Dawn

customer_reviews.title: No more ants!
customer_reviews.text: Have been struggling with ants around the kitchen for a long time. A friend suggested peppermint oil and wow!! Not a single ant in sight since I started using this. Put a couple of drops on cotton ball, wiped sides of walls, left cotton ball in corner, and ants immediately disappeared. Repeat every 3-4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Wolvy71

customer_reviews.title: I’ve bought their other scents but this one just doesn’t do the trick
customer_reviews.text: I was making small aroma spray bottles but after adding 20+ drops into these very small spray bottles, I still couldn’t tell what scent it was. I ended up adding other brand of peppermint and then I could smell the spray. Great price, but I guess you need to double, triple the amount?
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and Peppermint chases mice away unlike other brand
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and Peppermint chases mice away! Somehow mice were getting in my van. After trying everything this worked the best. A few drops on a cotton ball every week and no more mice. :) I had this brand first and it worked great for the mice not just in my van but also in the house. Last time I bought a different brand that starts with an "N" and is three letters. It smells funny, it does not smell like a candy cane! And the worst part is that it doesn't chase mice away! THIS is the GOOD stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Foollery

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for insect repel-ant
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil to use for some ants that were coming in my house. I have used another brand and had great results but this brand did nothing to deter them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Helps me to breath.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my candle aroma holder. Without heat. It aids me to breath. I have COPD. I put in a tablespoon of olive oil and about 4 drops of peppermint. At times I have also added a few drops of eucalyptus oil. As the scent weakens, I add more peppermint. I haven't tried to use for topical pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: cookie cutter

customer_reviews.title: Works at relieving headaches!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product before my sister-in-law recommended it for headaches. I suffer from chronic headaches so I decided to give it a try. I was surprised to experience an improvement in my headaches when I used this product. I just dab some peppermint on the spot where the headache originated and while it doesn’t eliminate the headache, it certainly lessens it. My daughter had a headache today and I put some peppermint on the spot where hers originated and she said it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. One of the new things I love in my life is peppermint oil it’s a very simple little silly thing however I’ve use this for so much I put it my shampoo I put it in my hair I put it on my hands I put a little in my face to wake up I put it in some drinks it’s got a great smell it makes you happy almost so in this product in this amount of it seems to be working very well I had I didn’t compare it to other peppermint oils but it is doing the job for me for sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT USE IN YOUR TOOTHPASTE
customer_reviews.text: Ok I realize it does not say to ingest but just in case there are other wholistic types out there that make their own toothpaste perhaps u should reconsider. I began having heart palpitations after brushing my teeth in morning. I'm healthy (as far as I know) , fit and run daily. Heart palpitations got scary b4 I figured out always after teeth brushing in a.m. just wanted to warn. They do sell peppermint oil for oral use, does not feel so fresh, but my heart likes it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Heavy peppermint smell...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. The exterminator uses an all natural peppermint oil around the house foundation to keep little critters away. I took a 5 oz cup and stuff with cotton balls and took many eye drop full of this oil to keep mice away in the house and put it around the water pipes. Not only did it work but freshen the area with a pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: KatieinCT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Peppermint oil is great to add to moisturizer for extra moisture but it also helps keep bugs away.
customer_reviews.author: kers3y

customer_reviews.title: BEST for the PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This brand probably gives you the most out for the price they have! $18 for 4FL OZ?! The Peppermint Oil smells great. I use it for my Oil Diffuser in my room and my car. The smell of peppermint really helps me sleep. I would def buy this one again because of the amount they give you!
customer_reviews.author: Tae Kim

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love peppermint essential oil and this is by far the ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love peppermint essential oil and this is by far the best deal I have came across. I have had the same bottle and used this oil for over 9 months now and I still have also a fourth of the bottle left. (Keep in mind I diffuse this almost on a daily basis) Not only has it lasted a very long time but in my opinion it is a great quality of oil as well! Absolutely a repurchase item for me. If you are looking for a good peppermint oil in a large quantity that isn't going to break the bank go for this one! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for external use only
customer_reviews.text: Just wish I had gotten food grade as this one is not so. Definitely smells like real peppermint for sure.. Have plenty of uses for it, on top of the fact that it is a non chemical deterrent for many insects, spiders, ants and such. As long as you know what you want to use it for, it is great and fairly reasonably priced. Can't answer about the longevity as it stays great in the glass spray bottle I use and doesn't require a lot to make up a spray batch, depending on how you want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: leenelson

customer_reviews.title: The smell is bad, dont buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not piperment, not a sure what it is but it spells really bad. I would not recommend the purchase of this product. The NOW product is much better, I an going back to NOW piperment essential oil.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong and doesn’t last as long as higher end brands
customer_reviews.text: Ummm, I’m not sure about this oil. I have bought peppermint oil in the past from aveda ( and that was mixed with carrier) , doTerra and young living. This stuff just doesn’t seem like it smells as sweet or strong enough as those others. It wears off quickly, and I don’t get the pain relief I need. I tried using it stronger strength and same results. I’m disappointed:( because I needed this really bad for my health. Now I have to buy from somewhere else. :(
customer_reviews.author: bunny mama ♥️

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the peppermint oil smell is very potent. I would recommend using it in VERY small amounts because I put way too much on and my head started burning 😂 I started freaking out but I looked it up and apparently that means it’s working. Whatever, I don’t like the feeling of my scalp on fire so I would still recommend a smaller dosage (a few drops mixed in with a carrier oil). A small amount of tingling is normal. I would also recommend mixing it with a carrier oil (such as coconut, almond or jojoba oil) to dilute :)
customer_reviews.author: ria

customer_reviews.title: This is not 100% pure Teatree oil. It does ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not 100% pure Teatree oil. It does not have the scientific name nor does it stay anywhere on the bottle any scientific information that is necessary for anyone purchasing and oil to know what is in it. I threw mine in the trash and bought another one from another company
customer_reviews.author: Carrie C.

customer_reviews.title: Natural repellent
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of ants from the backyard and I don’t want to use any poisonous chemicals. I have pets and my grand baby crawling all over. So I use a spray bottle with water and a few drops of peppermint oil and I spray as I mop and clean. I also spray window sills. It’s safe and effective.
customer_reviews.author: brunilda lopez

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is magic
customer_reviews.text: Strong smell and taste. Comes in a glass bottle. For me it does wonders for digestion. A single drop on the end of my finger and spread it on my lips and the inside of my mouth. The stuff even helps with dry lips during the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Dare

customer_reviews.title: Relief outweighs the smell!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pure, scent lingers a long time in any container you put it in. Permeates throughout the premise, I dislike the smell of mint, but combined with the other" soaking" product that I used, it was very effective for my foot swelling and pain!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Flan

customer_reviews.title: AVOID IT unless you want to waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: Very shaddy product. I usually don't return stuff when I bought it online, but I have to return this bottle because it doesn't smell anything at all... AVOID IT unless you want to waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar candies

customer_reviews.title: Contaminants
customer_reviews.text: This does not smell like pure peppermint, there is some contamination in my bottle. At first I though it was ok and I could continue using it but the more I use it the worse it gets. Instead of relieving my headache it has started making it worse. I do not recommend this brand if you have sensitivities to contaminants. I will not be buying this brand of essential oils again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Peppermint
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil to make candles for my family for Christmas. (Shh! Mum's the word!) It has a beautiful, pure, powerful aroma that can only come from unadulterated peppermint oil. I love it. And my candles, if they could talk, would say they love it, too, because the aroma rising from them - even unlit - is heavenly. I'll be buying from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M. Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily for pain relief - it works and feels great!
customer_reviews.text: We now depend on this great peppermint product for therapy and relief from aches and pains from workouts, carpal tunnel and other aches from strain. It takes about 5-10 minutes to really take effect, but the relief lasts a long time. Use it a few times daily; comes in a generous amount so it should last a long time. I have recommended this product to many of my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: This is a dual review from me and my wife...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I combined our review into one. She loves the Scent and said it helps her with some of the pain she has. Me on the other hand the Scent is good but on the Pain relief I am not able to tell any difference (have some severe pain issues). On the Longevity it is too early to tell...
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: What’s out for the stopper !
customer_reviews.text: Smell is amazing ! But when I got my package everything seemed to be n great shape I open the bottle and it goes everywhere. In the package I found a stopper that I believe was suppose to be in the bottle but it’s wasnt . So only remark make sure u open carefully
customer_reviews.author: Jessica.B

customer_reviews.title: Just a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this oil has a very strong peppermint scent! I put a spray nozzle on mine and if I spray just a tiny bit it’s enough for almost the entire room for the day. Be careful, it’s easy to use too much and it becomes overbearing. It does turn away bugs. Also my neighbor smokes very stinky pot which literally smells like a skunk set off in my apartment. This is the only thing I’ve found that clears that smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quickly handled an ant problem in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to combat a carpenter ant problem in my kitchen. I didn't want to spray my food prep areas with Raid, so I Googled ideas for a more natural option. This stuff worked like a charm! I put 16 drops into a 12 oz spray bottle, and doused my kitchen countertops and cupboards with it. Haven't seen an ant since. Plus, my kitchen smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: NationalParkHopper

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE IT! The product arrived a few days earlier than expected. I've had It for about a week now and I have to say I'm planning on buying another one. I'm using it with an Aroma Globe just a few drops does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Adi Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: ... repelente for the past 4 years and it works great! I have pets and wanted a safe alternative ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using peppermint oil as a bug repelente for the past 4 years and it works great! I have pets and wanted a safe alternative to conventional repelente. I always have a spray bottle with a 20% solution of the oil in water and every other day I spray around the doors and windows. The house smells great and the bugs stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Pi

customer_reviews.title: OIL SEEMS TO BE DELITED LATELY
customer_reviews.text: Are you deluting your oils? Just got a new batch and I had to put more oils and still wasn't as smelly as before. We use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: NYC

customer_reviews.title: Not pure and not therapeutic grade
customer_reviews.text: I have bottles of Peppermint oil from other companies and this one does Not smell like peppermint. It is obviously mixed with another oil to dilute it. Do not buy this is you want food grade or therapeutic oil or if you are hoping to get fresh peppermint smell from it. If you disagree, buy a tiny bottle from another source and compare the two, it will be obvious which is better. Anything else!
customer_reviews.author: S.Eve.Hounsh

customer_reviews.title: strong menthol, recommended for quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my pain salve. I keep it for months in the fridge, it is a little less menthol effect but still active and goid for beginning pain blick until the active herbs kick in. This us my second bottle of Magestic whom my brother recommended, I am very pleased with the menthol and feel comfortable with the company quality.
customer_reviews.author: Katie1554

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it's truly an oil...
customer_reviews.text: Did you know peppermint deters rodents? Purchased this for the rodents that enjoy rummaging around the back patio area. A few drops a day along the border seems to keep them away. Secondary use as an add in for a headache relief balm. I diluted it (5:1) and didn't notice any burning sensation. It's a bit runnier than say, NOW! Brand, but it works
customer_reviews.author: Arrowina

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this peppermint essential oil to help with sinus congestion. It seems to help and is not irritating. I put a few drops on a wash cloth, then place that on the shower floor where the warm water can dispense the aroma into the air.
customer_reviews.author: NotMartha

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Essential Oil
customer_reviews.text: I use the Majestic Pure essential oil in cold process soap, lotions and bath products. I have never had a bad experience with this brand and this peppermint essential oil is no exception. It is a strong and very pleasant smelling oil. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this oil and will definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Gets Rid of Rodents
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this peppermint oil to get rid of the little rodent friend that was visiting my car during the night and leaving droppings all over my kids' car seats. I just sprinkled it throughout the car, and haven't seen our little buddy since, so I'd say it did the trick, and it did not leave spots on the seats.
customer_reviews.author: allthatglittersisgold

customer_reviews.title: Had to dump this oil - gross
customer_reviews.text: I had to dump this oil. It smelled faintly of mildew. When I put this oil on fabric wick for diffusing, the wick turned black with mildew. gross.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand. Large size and dropper is nice instead of dabbing and not getting much out of the smaller bottles you often see.
customer_reviews.author: Mn Girl

customer_reviews.title: Rodent repellant
customer_reviews.text: It arrived very well wrapped. I appreciate this larger bottle, because I use it very frequently as a rodent repellent in the old building I work in. I believe it works well. Less droppings...🤨
customer_reviews.author: AZ Wildcat

customer_reviews.title: No more wet dog smell
customer_reviews.text: I just received the oil. I use it for sugar scrubs & in my mop water. The scent is great for getting rid of "wet dog 🐕," smell. Getting rid of the wet dogs wasn't an option. As a scrub , I use it with a base oil & sugar on my hands & feet. Refreshing after digging in the yard or after standing all day.
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great, long lasting aroma.. GET IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I am unaware of pain relief factor, but a large bottle, dropper, and amazing, longlasting peppermint scent. I use it on my chakra bracelet, with lava rock diffuser. I get compliments on the clean, refreshing aroma constantly
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Works to keep the mice away
customer_reviews.text: Did not buy it for pain the audits for the peppermint fragrance it is not as pure as I would have liked it it is kind of muddled but it does work for certain things have been using it to keep mice away has been working so far so if you have a mouse problem it would really work comes in a large portion bottle and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My mom uses this in scrubbs and for massage oils on a pro basis, nevermind the evaps, she gets loads of compliments on this
customer_reviews.author: Gr8fool

customer_reviews.title: Beware,
customer_reviews.text: the spell dissipated much faster than other peppermint oils that I have tried. When placed in a diffuser it was hardly noticeable even when I put in almost half the bottle and it did not spell like peppermint then
customer_reviews.author: Betty K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars! Best essential oil!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this product several times, and it is (by far) my favorite essential oil. It is very helpful with relieving congestion, and it has been excellent to use to help with sinus issues. Also, from a functional standpoint, the bottle and dropper work great!
customer_reviews.author: TGAJ

customer_reviews.title: In love with this EO
customer_reviews.text: I really like this peppermint eo. Peppermint scent is what helps to quell my anxiety. I had purchased a different brand recently and found their product far too strong. But, with this product, the selcent strength is perfect. I love diffusing this in my private space for destressing. Thank you majestic pure. You made my day with this product. Will order again! Will definitely recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great Humane Mice Deterrant
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I bought this as an alternative for a mice deterrant. I put several drops on cotton balls and placed around HVAC unit. No sign of mice . Much more humane than the awful mice traps and pellants. Mice don’t like the peppermint aroma.
customer_reviews.author: kpcpfam

customer_reviews.title: It works but doesn’t seem to be full strength peppermint oil
customer_reviews.text: I like this peppermint oil because it does work. I used it in my basement to keep the mice away. And it works. The only downside to the peppermint oil is that the scent is gone the next day, and the mice come back. I have to use the peppermint oil every day to keep the mice away. I guess that’s because the bottle says that the peppermint oil is therapeutic strength. I’m used to buying full strength peppermint oil that works without me reapplying it every day. Other than that the peppermint oil is good price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been great. We mix a little in water in a spray bottle and spray it around the house. The mosquitoes hate it and either flee or die. Same with roaches. The spray we use on the dogs to keep the fleas away also has peppermint oil in it, and the fleas don't like it either. It has many uses! This brand seems to be of very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great Theraputic Oil for Pain Relief But....
customer_reviews.text: This a great remedy for pain relief. Has a nice scent, but it's rather potent and strong. The bottle recommends adding it with a carrier oil like jojoba oil or olive oil. I had to order a bottle of jojoba oil which is coming soon via Amazon. There should be an option to order both these items together.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Kaneko

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t ask for a candle...but thanks anyway
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased from this seller before and love their oil for my son’s humidifier we have in his room. But this time when I received my order it was marked as peppermint oil but inside was a bubble wrapped vanilla wood wick candle.....I’m upset that I got the wrong product and even more confused that it was a candle and not even a different type of oil. The sticker on the bubble wrap even said peppermint essential oil.....
customer_reviews.author: Jourdan

customer_reviews.title: Scent is not what I am used to
customer_reviews.text: The scent is not what I expected for diffusing. I normally use aura cacia which is authentic scent yet pricer. Was trying to save money, but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Saydee

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping bugs outside!
customer_reviews.text: Live this stuff for mixing with a water bottle and then squirting the baseboards of our house to keep bugs and spiders outside!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I use Peppermint oil everyday in my cleaning and around the house. The one is economical and great smelling. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SewSewUnique

customer_reviews.title: No wasp
customer_reviews.text: Now I don’t use this on myself. I get an old meds bottle drill 1/8 in holes in it with cotton balls soaked in the peppermint oil. I put these where the wasps and yellow jackets like to make nests and they don’t like it. Have not had a problem with them yet
customer_reviews.author: bison smoker

customer_reviews.title: Daily use of this Peppermint oil clears sinus'
customer_reviews.text: I use this product daily as I have chronic Sinusitis. It helps me to breathe easier and works better than most over the counter treatments. I steam inhale 5 drops in a bowl of water every morning to start my day off right!
customer_reviews.author: Judy DeAntonellis

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT HONEST REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my car’s air diffuser. I’m a rideshare driver. My riders love this scent. I’m a night driver and this product keeps me alert and helps me create a soothing safe ride for everyone. The peppermint is refreshing, cool, and heightens all 5 senses in addition to the 6th dimension.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin De Gaviria

customer_reviews.title: Smelled off in a bad way
customer_reviews.text: Review from my wife:Not sure if I got a bad bottle or some thing it just didn’t smell right. Are use essential oil’s so I know what peppermint oil should smell like, this just didn’t seem right. I ended up throwing the bottle out. I’ll stick with the Plant therapy brand for next time.
customer_reviews.author: Seth B Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Essential Oil
customer_reviews.text: I use essential oils in my home to purify, calm and heal. This oil I use on my husband after having a major surgery to help with soothing and alleviating some of the stressors on the body after surgery. We use in foot soaks and for in the diffuser. This is a great product. Thank you Mrs R
customer_reviews.author: L D

customer_reviews.title: This oil gave me a HORRID headache and smells like an offbrand peppermint candy tastes
customer_reviews.text: This oil gave me a HORRID headache and smells like an offbrand peppermint candy tastes. I was leery to purchase this one because there are others that hold a dear spot in my heart, but I wanted to save a few bucks. I purchased two other scents (lavender and lemon) and they smell okay, but this one has been sitting in my cabinet since I pinpointed it was triggering my headaches. Won't be purchasing again. One thing I DO like that this purchase came with was the awesome dropper! Convenient, and made counting the drops so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Marquett

customer_reviews.title: Okay but....
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance in a diffuser just doesn’t smell, well like peppermint. Right out of the bottle is okay, but not strong peppermint say like another brand on amazon. Tried this brand after the other brand I had bought before was no longer capable of being shipped to my address (no idea). Alright but probably will experiment with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mahan

customer_reviews.title: Meeting my expectations of a good quality oil.
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be meeting my needs. I have not really had it long enough yet to know how it will go over a long period of time, but I’m happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rea James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great on insects which is the reason it was purchased. did not try for any other use.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen King

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Love peppermint oil. Use it to repel mosquitos and flies on the dogs, around the house for the invigorating fragrance and a few drops in the bath to refresh. We live in the country and our dogs are frequently with the goats. They are never bothered by bugs.
customer_reviews.author: luluschef

customer_reviews.title: Seriously worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing. I only buy young living oil but I tried this when a friend had bought it and decided to buy some myself because you get so much and it works just as good as young living peppermint.
customer_reviews.author: Cdry88

customer_reviews.title: The peppermint oil smells great. I purchased it to use in my garage ...
customer_reviews.text: The peppermint oil smells great. I purchased it to use in my garage in order to prevent rodents and insects from entering. I mixed it with water and sprayed it throughout the garage. I also drenched cotton balls in the oil and placed them near the entrance of the garage. It smells good and hopefully doing it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: More spearmint than peppermint
customer_reviews.text: Not my usual brand but smells nice & was cheaper. Smells more spearmint than peppermint-not sure about a reorder.
customer_reviews.author: T. V.

customer_reviews.title: this is a fake essential oil brand.
customer_reviews.text: this is a fake essential oil brand. when I was able to pour a lot (about 50-60 drops) to my diffuser and still barely smelled it I went looking to do some research and found a ripoff report that 5 of their oils were tested and had no trace of what the oil claimed to be
customer_reviews.author: Megburt

customer_reviews.title: Smells Horrendous
customer_reviews.text: The smell is horrible, does not smell like peppermint, smells like chemicals. Will be returning. One star review as shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: angouleme55

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: A really good price for a fine product. We use it for our vaporizer so I appreciate the reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Not strong
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong as young living but for about and price I got what I paid for.. peppermint oil is used for alot and with 4 kids and health problems it's a everyday use of mine so happy I had the big jar just wish it was little stronger
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Pellerin

customer_reviews.title: Very Potent Oil
customer_reviews.text: Potent peppermint oil. I put it in a spray bottle and a diffuser. Love the smell so I use it in every room in my house. Also, spiders and mice do not like it, and it keeps them away! That’s another plus!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L. Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: I love this Peppermint Oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this Peppermint Oil. Very good quality and a little goes a long way. I bought this along with the Fractionated Coconut out from Majestic Pure as well and used in combination the very first day I got them. I use about 2 capfulls of the coconut oil and 3-4 drops of the peppermint oil (it comes with the dropper). Very good for taking away sore muscles after 12 hour days on my feet. It also helped greatly with my terrible winter time sinus infection. The services on this as well was excellent. I received the products way before the estimated time and everything was as requested. I WILL order more items from Majestic Pure. Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frogee27

customer_reviews.title: It works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep rodents out of my RV when it is parked. I store at my weekend cabin in the mountains, and have been plagued by mice. This was suggested to me by my mechanic. I soak cotton balls in the oil, and scatter them around the RV. Since doing this, no more mice signs. The only problem is that I have to recharge them about once a month, since the smell fades. Some people may not like the peppermint odor, since it is really strong. But I like the smell of peppermint, so it's not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Spider Repellent Worked!
customer_reviews.text: I had a huge spider sac hatch above my bed. It was a nightmare. Mini spiders all coming from the ceiling down to my bed. It was way too many to just vacuum or kill. So I made a solution of peppermint oil and water in a spray bottle, sprayed it in corners and misted it everywhere. Magic. This is my first time using essential oil so I haven't tried any of the other remedies or benefits I'm told it offers.
customer_reviews.author: Jipsi Love

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price and how big the bottle is. I used it for a natural bug repellent spray for my house. I used a lot of peppermint (drops of peppermint and the rest water in a spray bottle) The smell is strong cause I like it like that but it doesn’t last a long time. I haven’t seen any crawlers in my place since really.
customer_reviews.author: Lela Thongdy

product_meta.title: Majestic Pure Peppermint Essential Oil, Pure and Natural, Therapeutic Grade Peppermint Oil, 4 fl. oz.
feature_bullets: Majestic Pure Peppermint Essential Oil - Pure and natural peppermint oil; non-toxic, no additives, unfiltered and undiluted with no fillers; therapeutic grade; packaged in the USA.
Peppermint offers multiple household uses; it provides a wonderful cooling sensation; Our oil is non-toxic and great for use around homes and gardens.

SAFETY WARNING: For external use only. Other than aromatherapy, dilute with a carrier oil. Keep out of the reach of children and pets. Avoid contact with eyes. If pregnant, consult with your health care provider before use.
Delivered with a premium quality glass dropper for ease-of-use

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
